# locale(_:)

**Instance Method**

A modifier to set the locale of the format style.

## Declaration

```swift
func locale(_ locale: Locale) -> Duration.UnitsFormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **locale**: The locale to apply to the format style.

## Return Value

A copy of this format with the new locale set.

## Working with locales

- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting the duration.
